plugins.name: AI Proxy
plugins.description: Call supported Large Language Model vendors and models through Kong Gateway, using mediated data formats and authentication

plugins.name: AI Prompt Decorator
plugins.description: Prepend or append an array of llm/v1/chat messages to a user's chat history

plugins.name: AI Prompt Guard
plugins.description: Check llm/v1/chat or llm/v1/completions requests against a list of allowed or denied expressions

plugins.name: AI Prompt Template
plugins.description: Provide fill-in-the-blank AI prompts to users

plugins.name: AI Request Transformer
plugins.description: Use an LLM service to inspect and transform the client's request body prior to proxying the request to the upstream server

plugins.name: AI Response Transformer
plugins.description: Use an LLM service to examine the upstream HTTP(S) prior to forwarding it to the client

plugins.name: Basic Authentication
plugins.description: Add Basic Authentication to your services

plugins.name: HMAC Auth
plugins.description: Add HMAC Authentication to your services

plugins.name: JWE Decrypt
plugins.description: Decrypt a JWE token in a request

plugins.name: JWT
plugins.description: Verify and authenticate JSON Web Tokens

plugins.name: Key Auth
plugins.description: Add key authentication to your Services

plugins.name: Key Authentication - Encrypted
plugins.description: Add key authentication to your services

plugins.name: Kong JWT Signer
plugins.description: Verify and sign one or two tokens in a request

plugins.name: LDAP Authentication
plugins.description: Integrate Kong with an LDAP server

plugins.name: LDAP Authentication Advanced
plugins.description: Secure Kong with username and password protection, use LDAP search and service directory mapping

plugins.name: Mutual TLS Authentication
plugins.description: Secure routes and services with client certificate and mutual TLS authentication

plugins.name: OAuth 2.0 Authentication
plugins.description: Add OAuth 2.0 authentication to your service

plugins.name: OAuth 2.0 Introspection
plugins.description: Integrate Kong with a third-party OAuth 2.0 Authorization Server

plugins.name: OpenID Connect
plugins.description: Integrate Kong with a third-party OpenID Connect provider

plugins.name: Portal Application Registration
plugins.description: Allow portal developers to register applications against services

plugins.name: SAML
plugins.description: Provides SAML v2.0 authentication and authorization between a service provider (Kong) and an identity provider (IdP)

plugins.name: Session
plugins.description: Support sessions for Kong authentication plugins.

plugins.name: Vault Authentication
plugins.description: Add Vault authentication to your services

plugins.name: Okta
plugins.description: Integrate Okta's API Access Management (OAuth as a Service) with Kong API Gateway

plugins.name: ACME
plugins.description: Let's Encrypt and ACMEv2 integration with Kong Gateway

plugins.name: Bot Detection
plugins.description: Detect and block bots or custom clients

plugins.name: CORS
plugins.description: Allow developers to make requests from the browser

plugins.name: IP Restriction
plugins.description: Allow or deny IPs that can make requests to your services

plugins.name: OPA
plugins.description: Authorize requests against Open Policy Agent

plugins.name: TLS Handshake Modifier
plugins.description: Requests a client to present its client certificate

plugins.name: TLS Metadata Headers
plugins.description: Proxies TLS client certificate metadata to upstream services via HTTP headers

plugins.name: Imperva API Security
plugins.description: Integrate Kong Gateway with Imperva API Security to discover, monitor, and protect APIs

plugins.name: ACL
plugins.description: Control which consumers can access services

plugins.name: Canary Release
plugins.description: Slowly roll out software changes to a subset of users

plugins.name: Forward Proxy Advanced
plugins.description: Allows Kong to connect to intermediary transparent HTTP proxies

plugins.name: GraphQL Proxy Caching Advanced
plugins.description: Cache and serve commonly requested responses in Kong

plugins.name: GraphQL Rate Limiting Advanced
plugins.description: Provide rate limiting for GraphQL queries

plugins.name: Mocking
plugins.description: Provide mock endpoints to test your APIs against your services

plugins.name: OAS Validation
plugins.description: Validate HTTP requests and responses based on an OpenAPI 3.0 or Swagger API Specification

plugins.name: Proxy Cache
plugins.description: Cache and serve commonly requested responses in Kong

plugins.name: Proxy Caching Advanced
plugins.description: Cache and serve commonly requested responses in Kong

plugins.name: Rate Limiting
plugins.description: Rate limit how many HTTP requests can be made in a period of time

plugins.name: Rate Limiting Advanced
plugins.description: Upgrades Kong Rate Limiting with more flexibility and higher performance

plugins.name: Request Size Limiting
plugins.description: Block requests with bodies greater than a specified size

plugins.name: Request Termination
plugins.description: Terminates all requests with a specific response

plugins.name: Request Validator
plugins.description: Validates requests before they reach the upstream service

plugins.name: Response Rate Limiting
plugins.description: Rate limit based on a custom response header value

plugins.name: Route By Header
plugins.description: Route request based on request headers

plugins.name: Upstream Timeout
plugins.description: Set timeouts on routes and override service-level timeouts

plugins.name: WebSocket Size Limit
plugins.description: Block incoming WebSocket messages greater than a specified size

plugins.name: WebSocket Validator
plugins.description: Validate WebSocket messages before they are proxied

plugins.name: XML Threat Protection
plugins.description: Apply structural and size checks on XML payloads

plugins.name: AWS Lambda
plugins.description: Invoke and manage AWS Lambda functions from Kong

plugins.name: Apache OpenWhisk
plugins.description: Invoke and manage OpenWhisk actions from Kong

plugins.name: Azure Functions
plugins.description: Invoke and manage Azure functions from Kong

plugins.name: Kong Functions (Post-Plugin)
plugins.description: Add and manage custom Lua functions to run after other plugins

plugins.name: Kong Functions (Pre-Plugins)
plugins.description: Add and manage custom Lua functions to run before other plugins
